moves.54. Ka7:
This is the move I wanted analyzed.  I was pretty sure it was over and should have resigned.  Still doesn't look clear that I had any hope even from the discrepancy in the analysis of the two possible moves.  Is 54.Kc6 really that much better?  Maybe only from the point of view that it prolongs the game and allows more time for my opponent to make a mistake.
